common.title: Tactical HQ
common.missionDesc: The requested tactical coordinates were either not found or have been redacted.
common.classifiedDesc: This tactical simulation is currently under top-secret development. Access is restricted.
common.rotateDesc: Tactical simulations require landscape orientation for optimal unit management.

home.heroSubtitle: Elite tactical simulations designed for the modern commander. Precision logic meets high-intensity gameplay.

hex-conquest.title: Hex Conquest
hex-conquest.description: A turn-based strategy game where you capture territory on a hexagonal grid.

tower-defense-lite.title: Tower Defense Lite
tower-defense-lite.description: Defend your base against waves of enemies in this minimalist tower defense.

grid-wars.title: Grid Wars
grid-wars.description: Tactical grid combat. Outmaneuver your opponent in this chess-like game.

logic-robot.title: Logic Robot
logic-robot.description: Program your robot to navigate the city. Avoid obstacles and reach the target building.

logicRobot.mainGoal: Program the tactical unit to reach the objective flag using logic tokens.
logicRobot.step1Desc: Select direction tokens to add commands to the unit's local buffer.
logicRobot.step2Desc: Use adjustment controls to define movement steps for each instruction.
logicRobot.step3Desc: Architectural obstacles trigger a command abort. Calculate paths carefully.
logicRobot.step4Desc: Execute the program. Success is achieved upon objective contact.

towerDefense.mainGoal: Strategic focus required. Prevent the enemy advance at all costs.
towerDefense.step1Desc: Click empty slots ($50) to deploy strategic defensive towers.
towerDefense.step2Desc: Towers engage targets within their radius automatically.
towerDefense.step3Desc: Neutralizing threats generates credits for fortification.
towerDefense.step4Desc: Opposition intensity increases. Plan for long-term survival.
towerDefense.luck: Protect the base at all costs, Commander.
towerDefense.overrunDesc: Strategic containment failed. You survived <1>{{count}} intensive waves</1> of opposition.

gridWars.mainGoal: Train your memory to identify and neutralize hidden tactical units.
gridWars.step1Desc: Flip any card to see which tactical unit is hidden.
gridWars.step2Desc: Match two units of the same type to secure them.
gridWars.step4Desc: Clear the field in the fewest moves to earn high honors.
gridWars.completeDesc: Field cleared with high efficiency in <1>{{count}} tactical moves</1>.

hexConquest.mainGoal: Capture as much territory as possible to outperform the opposition AI.
hexConquest.step1Desc: Secure any available gray sector to claim it for your team.
hexConquest.step2Desc: The opposition will immediately attempt to re-establish control.
hexConquest.step3Desc: Plan sectors ahead to block AI expansion routes.
hexConquest.step4Desc: When all sectors are claimed, the majority owner wins.
hexConquest.successDesc: You have successfully secured the intelligence territory.
hexConquest.failureDesc: The opposition has established regional control.
hexConquest.drawDesc: High-intensity stalemate: No strategic gain Achieved.
